book.synopsis: When destitute trapper Ben Frazier is led to a bevy of gold by a sympathetic Arapaho warrior, he becomes a target for a group of greedy renegade trappers, and mountain man Zach King is the only one who can save him. Original.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.25 Inches, Length: 4.75 Inches, Weight: 0.2 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
